    # 
    module.exports = function(hljs) {

  var ATOM = {

    className: 'atom',
    begin: /[a-z][A-Za-z0-9_]*/,
    relevance: 0
  };

  var VAR = {
    # 
        className: 'name',
    variants: [
      {begin: /[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*/},
      {begin: /_[A-Za-z0-9_]*/},
    ],
    relevance: 0
  };

  var PARENTED = {

    begin: /\(/,
    end: /\)/,
    relevance: 0
  };

  var LIST = {

    begin: /\[/,
    end: /\]/
  };

  var LINE_COMMENT = {
    # 
        className: 'comment',
    begin: /%/, end: /$/,
    contains: [hljs.PHRASAL_WORDS_MODE]
  };

  var BACKTICK_STRING = {
    # 
        className: 'string',
    begin: /`/, end: /`/,
    contains: [hljs.BACKSLASH_ESCAPE]
  };

  var CHAR_CODE = {
    # 
        className: 'string', // 0'a etc.
    begin: /0\'(\\\'|.)/
  };

  var SPACE_CODE = {
    # 
        className: 'string',
    begin: /0\'\\s/ // 0'\s
  };

  var PRED_OP = { // relevance booster
    begin: /:-/
  };

  var inner = [

    ATOM,
    VAR,
    PARENTED,
    PRED_OP,
    LIST,
    LINE_COMMENT,
    hljs.C_BLOCK_COMMENT_MODE,
    hljs.QUOTE_STRING_MODE,
    hljs.APOS_STRING_MODE,
    BACKTICK_STRING,
    CHAR_CODE,
    SPACE_CODE,
    hljs.C_NUMBER_MODE
  ];

  PARENTED.contains = inner;
  LIST.contains = inner;

  return {
    contains: inner.concat([
      {begin: /\.$/} // relevance booster
    ])
  };
};
